Building A Weather App with React + Tailwind

April 9, 2021

With the year finally in full swing, and outside opening back up again, Ive decided that its time for a new post/tutorial??

Over the past few months, I been playing around with React, which is something I didnt think I would ever do again. However thanks to some convincing from my mentor and fellow developers I decided to give it another shot. I first had to figure out how not to repeat the same mistakes I made with React the last time I tried my hand at it. This lead me to taking on a different approach to learning React by building something in real time and doing documentation as much as possible in the process.

The project I choose to work on in order to hone those skills and gain hands on knowledge a simple custom weather app, but with a few modifications. It was built with a update function to be accessible via a custom API and I modified the UI aspects usuing Tailwind. More on this below...
